value.0: A svirfneblin slave, Ber Delanion, has asked for someone to kill his mistress, an evil drow priestess.

A svirfneblin slave, Ber Delanion, has asked for someone to kill his mistress, an evil drow priestess. 
The priestess has been killed and Ber Delanion was very happy to go home.

A group of rangers from Battledale have been tracking down a kidnapped child, who is the heir to a Barony. The heir was stolen from his father's castle by a couple of soldiers who wanted to save the child from being sacrificed to a demon. The father was killed by Zhents, but the castle was recovered by the boy's uncle. 
The rangers have offered to pay 500 gold for rescuing the child from an army of drow, who attacked them in the cavern where the boy was taken.

A group of rangers from Battledale have been tracking down a kidnapped child, who is the heir to a Barony. The heir was stolen from his father's castle by a couple of soldiers who wanted to save the child from being sacrificed to a demon. The father was killed by Zhents, but the castle was recovered by the boy's uncle. 
The rangers have offered to pay 500 gold for rescuing the child from an army of drow, who attacked them in the cavern where the boy was taken.
A gnome slave named Ber Delanion told the story of how the drow priestess, Bessada Ne'Phaz, somehow knew about the child hiding in the cave and took an army of drow to capture him, for great rewards. Ber didn't know how Bessada could have known about the child.

A group of rangers from Battledale have been tracking down a kidnapped child, who is the heir to a Barony. The heir was stolen from his father's castle by a couple of soldiers who wanted to save the child from being sacrificed to a demon. The father was killed by Zhents, but the castle was recovered by the boy's uncle. 
The rangers have offered to pay 500 gold for rescuing the child from an army of drow, who attacked them in the cavern where the boy was taken.
The child has been rescued and returned to the rangers for a reward.
